title: Hyundai
description: The brand 'Hyundai' is recognized in its industry by its characteristic deep blue color, represented by the hex code '00287A'. This color is widely associated with Hyundai's branding efforts and its official appearance in various marketing and branding materials. These colors and their representation are sourced and confirmed through the publication available at 'https://issuu.com/lukaszkulakowski/docs/hyundai'. Hyundai, as a leading figure in the automotive industry, leverages this color to communicate reliability and trust.
